javadoc: Utility class for default application things.

methods.javadoc:
Searches for default application root directories.
@return A collection of discovered application root directories (could be empty).
methods.name: findDefaultApplicationRootDirs
methods.comment: Searches for default application root directories.

return.comment: A collection of discovered application root directories (could be empty).

methods.name: getDefaultUserTempDir
methods.comment: Gets the default application's user temp directory.

throws.comment: if the user temp directory could not be determined.

return.comment: The default application's user temp directory.

methods.name: getDefaultUserCacheDir
methods.comment: Gets the default application's user cache directory.

throws.comment: if the user cache directory could not be determined.

return.comment: The default application's user cache directory.

methods.name: getDefaultUserSettingsDir
methods.comment: Gets the default application's user settings directory.

throws.comment: if the user settings directory could not be determined.

name: ApplicationUtilities
comment: Utility class for default application things.
